entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries near noon. Blowing snow near noon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
